Room.Name: Maid's Quarters
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the primary quarters of the maids of the Palace.
Room.LongDescription: The maids are responsible for serving the guests and mages of the Palace. Most of them are used in the dining hall but occassionally they bring drinks to the guests in the lounge and entertainment rooms. Like the servants quarters, these are well cleaned with ample space for each maid.
